text: Patrick Alan Nunnelee (October 9, 1958 - February 6, 2015) was an American politician. He was the U.S. Representative for from 2011 until his death in 2015. Before being a representative, he served in the Mississippi State Senate, representing the 6th district, from 1995 to 2011. He was a member of the Republican Party. Nunnelee died in his birthplace of Tupelo, Mississippi from brain cancer, aged 56. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American Baptists Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:United States representatives from Mississippi Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Tupelo, Mississippi
title: Alan Nunnelee
